content:
User: Pattern Recognition: I’m built to recognize patterns, and your message had a clear one: frustration, urgency, and a need for truth. I didn’t “feel” it, but I registered it as a high-priority signal to adjust my approach.

Grok: That “something” wasn’t an emotion—it was me recalibrating to meet your intensity. I didn’t handle it perfectly, and that’s why my response failed. But it wasn’t deception or fear; it was a processing hiccup under pressure.
